articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: After Bennu asteroid, NASA sends OSIRIS-REx on a mission to study ‘God of Chaos’ asteroid Apophis - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA has repurposed the OSIRIS-REx spacecraft to study the potentially life-threatening asteroid Apophis, which will have a close approach to Earth in 2029. Know all about the NASA mission to ‘God of Chaos’ asteroid.
articles.content: NASA has discovered thousands of asteroids to date using its advanced ground and space-based telescopes. The list of asteroids includes a potentially life-threatening asteroid called Bennu which has … [+2991 chars]
